document.title: Clear Aligner Treatment for Upper Teeth
document.summary: This treatment involves using clear aligners to adjust the alignment of your upper teeth. The process is expected to take approximately 4-6 months, with progress primarily monitored remotely. Whitening is included as part of your treatment package.
next_steps: Begin your aligner treatment as scheduled
Utilize remote monitoring tools as instructed
Contact your provider with any questions or concerns
